item.title: try redis-a brief tutorial
item.description: Tutorial Redis is what is called a key-value store, often referred to as a NoSQL database. Redis是一种key-value存储,经常被称为NOSQL。 SET和GET 1 2 3 4 > set server:name "fido" OK > get server:name "fido" MSE
